data.name: After I met that catgirl, my questlist got too long! - Dakimakura pack
data.detailed_description:
Celebrate the anniversary of Questlist with the official dakimakura covers designed for self-printing!
  • Front and back pin-ups of Vera, Téa and Reniel
  • Optimized for 150x50cm pillow cases

To find the files, right-click the game in your library, select Manage > Browse local files.
You'll find the dakimakura files in their own folder!
data.about_the_game:

data.short_description: Enjoy the dakimakuras of Vera, Téa and Reniel!

fullgame.name: After I met that catgirl, my questlist got too long!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft® Windows® 7/8/8.1/10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core2 Duo or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 9/OpenGL capable GPU
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
